name: Efficient Governance
title: Least Time Spent on Government Regulations
description: In 2020, Tunisia's senior management spent only 0.1% of their time dealing with government regulations, the lowest globally. This efficiency allows businesses to focus more on growth and innovation.

name: Education Investment Champs
title: High Government Expenditure on Secondary Education
description: In 2015, Tunisia allocated 71.59% of its education budget to secondary education, with 52.40% of GDP per capita spent per student, showcasing a strong commitment to educational development.

name: Health Priority
title: Top ARI Treatment for Children
description: In 2018, 97.5% of Tunisian children under 5 with acute respiratory infections were taken to a health provider, reflecting the country's strong healthcare focus for its youngest citizens.

name: Childhood Nutrition Challenge
title: High Prevalence of Overweight Boys
description: In 2018, 18% of Tunisian boys under 5 were overweight, indicating a growing concern for childhood nutrition and the need for balanced dietary interventions.
